name: African American Inventors and Scientists
content:
Description: data about various famous African American inventors and scientists, and what they're famous for.

[Source](http://www.blackinventor.com/)

Columns:

* Name (string): name of that inventor or scientist
* Date of birth / death (string): what year that inventor or scientist was born and died in, if such information is available
* Occupations (string): what field(s) of study that person worked in
* Inventions / accomplishments (string): that person's most notable contributions to their fields or inventions
